resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

item.summary: Wash your hands. Clean wound, apply antibiotic, cover with bandage.
Wash your hands. Run under cool water, apply lotion, cover with bandage. Do not pop blisters.
Stand behind person. Make fist above belly button, clasp with other hand. Pull sharply inward and upward, repeat until choking stops.
Flush eyes with running cool water until clear. For chemicals, rinse for 10 minutes.
Administer Epipen to thigh if available. Identify allergen and call paramedics.
Identify animal if possible. Treat like a cut. If rabies is suspected, contact doctor.
Move person to shade or cool place. Have person slowly sip cool water.
Remove wet clothing. Move person to warm place. Soak extremities in cool (NOT hot) water.
Give person sugary drink or snack, such as fruit juice, candy (NOT sugar-free), or honey.
